Paypal, checks or money orders are all fine.

My email is: agonzdude@yahoo.com and for reference my ebay-id is iggy-man.  

Here is the link:

[url]http://jaguar.ir.miami.edu/~iggy/BB_cards2/[/url]

In the shameless plug department, I'm running a variety of prewar autions on ebay which end next week... [URL="http://search.ebay.com/_W0QQsassZiggy-manQQhtZ-1QQfrppZ200QQfsopZ1QQfsooZ1QQrdZ0"]as long as you are in the neighborhood, click here to view my ebay auctions!
[/URL]   

Lovely Day...

Posted By: Jim VB
Hey Brian, on these boards, if a poster has entered his email address when he posted, his name is in blue letters on the left side of the post (under "author", not "login). If the name is in black, then they did not enter it. 

If you click on that blue name, the email comes up. 

I think I remember someone saying this didn't work so well with a MAC, but always seems to be good with a PC. 

(I see iggy didn't have it in his original post however.)
